info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 15 at 4:31PM CDT until July 15 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS St Louis MO
info.description:
* WHAT...Urban area and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...A portion of southwest Illinois, including the following county, northwestern Madison.
* WHEN...Until 600 PM CDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 431 PM CDT, the public reported heavy rain in Bethalto due to thunderstorms. This is causing urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Bethalto, Rosewood Heights, Wood River, and East Alton is the most likely place to experience minor flooding. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... St. Louis, Granite City, Alton, Edwardsville, Godfrey, Glen Carbon, Wood River, Bethalto, Pontoon Beach, East Alton, South Roxana, Roxana, Hartford, West Alton, Rosewood Heights, Carpenter, Poag and Mitchell.
info.instruction: Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CDT THIS EVENING
